author: Cole Schotz
title: Committee Formation Meeting for Samson Resources Corporation, et al.
text:
Committee Formation Meeting for Samson Resources Corporation, et al. more+ Contact 
To embed, copy and paste the code into your website or blog: <iframe src="http://www.jdsupra.com/post/contentViewerEmbed.aspx?fid=19231f10-d5ba-405d-8beb-3f67d96ee02a" width="100%" height="620" frameborder="1" style="border: 2px solid #ccc; overflow-x:hidden !important; overflow:hidden;" scrolling="auto"></iframe> 
Upcoming Committee Formation Meeting : September 30, 2015 at 10:00 a.m. 
Case Name: Samson Resources Corporation, et al. Case Number: 15-11934 (CSS) 
Location: Sheraton Suites Wilmington Downtown, 422 Delaware Ave. Wilmington, DE 19801 
The petition (including the consolidated list of largest 50 creditors), first day declaration (with exhibits A , B and C ) and the proposed disclosure statement (without exhibits) are attached. The docket is available through GCG . You can learn more about these filings here . 
DISCLAIMER: Because of the generality of this update, the information provided herein may not be applicable in all situations and should not be acted upon without specific legal advice based on particular situations.
